dct_description_sm: recens emendata atque edita, per Ioannem Sambucum Pannonium, Imp. Ms. Historicum. 1579.
Bar scale on map given in "Scala Milliarium Hungaricorum."
Decorative border and cartouche, pictorial vignettes of fauna.
Dedication: Serenifs Principi D. Carolo Archiduci, Maximiliani II. Fratri, dicatum.
Appears in Ortelius' Theatrum Orbis Terrarum, 1579.
